chapter.title: What the student sees
chapter.para: onCourse has a password free purchasing process meaning that students don't have to remember obsure student identification details from their last enrolment. Where a student has enrolled previously they can move immediately to the payment process, automatically matched to their previous record.

section.title: Student Details
section.para: After a student has selected which class/es they want to enrol in and clicked on the button 'PROCEED TO CHECKOUT' they will see the page below. All the student need to enter here is their first name, last name and email address.

section.title: Previously Enrolled Students
section.para: If the student enrolling in the class/es have already enrolled in a previous class (therefore their details are already stored in your database) then after they have entered their first name, last name and email address it will jump straight to the summary page.

section.title: New Students
section.para: If this is the first time the student has enrolling in a class then after they have entered their first name, last name and email address then it will take them to an additional page where more details need to be captured. All the details on this page can be made mandatory or optional within the CMS. As you can see below the only question that is mandatory is their postcode which is marked with a '*' symbol. The student can also answer a marketing question along with choose whether they have any concessions.

section.title: Adding a Friend
section.para: Once a student has entered all their details they will be directed to a summary page. In this page you have the option of adding another student to this order. The button can be found below the class/es that are being enrolled in and above the field where you can add a promotional code, gift certificate or voucher. If clicked on then it will take you back to the 'YOUR DETAILS' page allowing you to enter the addtional students details.

section.title: Summary
section.para: Once a student has entered all their details they will be directed to a summary page.
This page includes the following information:
* Full name and Email Address of the student/s enrolling
* Price before and after discount of each class along with a total at the bottom right of the page
* A option to add another student (please see the section above called 'Adding a Friend' for more information)
* A field to enter promotional codes, gift certificates or vouchers (more information on this can be found in the Payment Options chapter of the manual)

Once the student has read the summary of information and is happy with the details enter, they can proceed to the payment page by clicking on the 'Proceed to Payment' button at the bottom of the page.

section.title: Payment
section.para: Once on the student is on the 'PAYMENT' page there are two main ways to pay for the class/es, these are:
* Pay using a credit or debit card

* Click on the 'CorporatePass' option then they can enter their CorporatePass code in the field to complete the transaction without the need for a payment at this time (more information on this can be found in the Payment Options chapter of the manual).

section.title: Confirmation
section.para: After the student has confirmed the purchase of their online enrolment then they will either be directed to a confirmation page that includes the following information:
Or they will be re-directed to a post enrolment page that you have created within the CMS.
